name: urcash-tauri-app
description: URCash Point of Sale Application built with Tauri

scripts.build:windows: cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.build:linux: cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:all: npm run build:rust-server && npm run build:frontend && npm run build
